Sentencas: The use of ammonia as a source of hydrogen for fuel cells has received little attention until now.
Titulo: Ammonia as a fuel in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Ammonia offers several advantages over hydrogen as a fuel and is produced commercially in massive quantities and as a biogas.
Titulo: Ammonia as a fuel in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This paper describes the results of a solid oxide fuel cell-based system running on ammonia and compares the performance with respect to hydrogen.
Titulo: Ammonia as a fuel in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A novel catalyst concept has been devised and employed with success.
Titulo: Ammonia as a fuel in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Results indicate that the ammonia performance, using the catalyst is comparable to hydrogen suggesting ammonia can be treated as an attractive alternative fuel.
Titulo: Ammonia as a fuel in solid oxide fuel cells
